page.title: 03Meth. Chapel Aston Munslow
page.content: Just off the B4368 up a quiet lane you will find a small and very neat {methodist chapel.}A plaque above the door says it was built in{1826.} Inside we noticed a little font in the window which was as big as a small mixing bowl.The chapel has 8 small windows and a small pulpit with an altar rail in front of it.The organ is a small pedal version.On the wall there is a small brass plaque in memory of Mr and Mrs Price and their son who died in Palestine. The chapel has a small house underneath it where the Price family used to live. There are now 13 members and the services are at 6.30pm.There was a christening held on 5th May 1985.
